oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tri-State Fair Racing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Splendid Racing at the Tri-State Fair -- Running Races Pacing Races Trotting Races -- Open purses for all classes. Entries close September 22 -- Write for entry blanks – state which you want – running or harness -- Tri-State Fair – Sept. 28 to Oct. 7, ’08 -- For all information, address R. M. Williams, Secretary, Box 1011, Memphis, Tenn.” Black-and-white image of jockeys riding horses with red and black lettering.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mid-South Fair; horse racing; recreation;
